title: Global music market grew by 18.5% in 2021, driven by paid subscription streaming
description: Read IFPI’s Global Music Report 2022 – State of the Industry here 22nd March 2022 – The global recorded music market grew by 18.5% in 2021, driven by growth in paid subscription streaming, according to IFPI, the organisation that represents the recorded music industry worldwide. Figures released today in IFPI’s Global Music Report show total […]
